documents.document: @Oh4amuseoffire I haven't got tix for anything yet, but def coming in summer at least. And excited for the big winter Cicero adaptation.
Got my new @The_Globe season booked - most excited for Boudica! #theatre
Can't talk, hanging a lobster.
@Oh4amuseoffire What do you make of the new RSC season? Thinking of maybe checking out some of the SuA lit festival stuff, btw.
@Out_of_Joint @exitthelemming You can play it with more than two routes but I never have, we've never been good enough to nail two at once!
@Out_of_Joint @exitthelemming So ball is travelling around on one route, at the same time 'names' are travelling a second route. V hard!
@Out_of_Joint @exitthelemming Say someone's name, they say someone else's name, till everyone's been said. In different order from route 1.
@Out_of_Joint @exitthelemming Form circle. Throw ball to someone, they throw to someone else till it's been to everyone. Repeat. Route 1.
@exitthelemming @Out_of_Joint Routes (1 route with names, 1 with ball at same time); wink murder; who killed King John; NOT ZIP ZAP BOING.
p@BechdelTheatre Btw the other @VAULTFestival play I wrote, @Claustrophilia_ , technically passes Bechdel test (but is a one-women show).
Excited to see this brilliant show @VAULTFestival - saw it two years ago and cried buckets. Get your tickets! https://t.co/AUA14HeOdl
Thanks for the 'Puppy' shoutout - in some fine company! https://t.co/1PhwqLevI5
I mean, massive respect to any writer who decides their script needs 30 live rabbits and sticks to it. #midsomermurders
Midsomer Murders episode set in the dark, grisly world of rabbit showjumping. I was into rabbit showjumping before it was cool.
Somewhere William Henry Harrison is looking down and thinking, "Thank God I'm no longer the most useless President in history."
Dear casting directors: Please don't use the word "bants" in a casting call.
I want to know ALL about it. https://t.co/US6dLcwPmL
I currently mentor two arts students, and I've been mentored. Blown away by the support & openness from other women in the theatre industry.
Oh my giddy aunt. It's Sunday, even super villains take the day off. https://t.co/5EHFoGIh5b
@braintree_ Pitch it to @VAULTFestival next year
@Michael_Southan Thank you! Long live #warpig
Literally sulking because I realised there is no Olivier specifically for playwriting (anymore).
Okay but @DFS actually gave really great customer service and this is the comfiest sofa ever. https://t.co/5O4hkmExrX
Telegraph says blackcurrant is the superfood of 2017. Excellent news as my blood was 50% Ribena until I was about 8.
"Peace through strength. Strength through purity. Purity through faith." Finished it for you, @realDonaldTrump https://t.co/oFre8SpWQX
Maybe we're actually in the "Biff" alternate reality from Back to the Future part 2?
Okay nine @BuzzFeed quizzes all say I'm going to get married this year so I'm feeling pretty positive about 2017.
At @NewDiorama for a "secret" preview/rehearsal of new @NationalTheatre show Lost Without Words - fascinating and brilliantly performed!
@districtline Thanks for not announcing change of destination till after we left Earls Court, meaning no way to get off and change!
I took this picture 8 years ago - the positivity and optimism just walking around DC was palpable. What now? https://t.co/vuYozP1nXc
Look at my friend's amazing show, so proud of you all @LookLeftLookRt can't wait to see it. https://t.co/e4wIG4KdKN
@bushtheatre @VAULTFestival Thank you for the shoutout!! Can't wait to see your new place.
@jk_rowling Trump's horcrux is his hairpiece.
I stand in solidarity w British East Asian artists & allies against yellowface casting. #InTheDepths #stopyellowface https://t.co/B88ONShqia
@she__who East Putney! Did I send you links to my Vault plays btw?
Oh my God, only going to have my first NEW YORK play!!!
@she__who I'm v bitter that @Olympic_Cinema is now a whole mile and a half away from me, rather than being four door down.
@putneysw15 @she__who @ODEONCinemas Oh hooray, my local.
@SarahMillican75 Morning! https://t.co/s5BB1Mjohn
@emmyfran209 PLOT TWIST: six months later you see him winning X Factor and have a moment of personal pride
Finally watched Sherlock - can we please have an AGRA spinoff starring @ChimpsinSocks?
Director meeting, director meeting, director meeting, rat funeral. #typicalday #monday
And you've just come from a meeting with the director of your third play which you're hoping to do @VAULTFestival 2018...
When you have a meeting with the director of your @VAULTFestival play, and director of your other @VAULTFestival play is on the next table.
Actual quote from an email I just received: "I miss you almost as much as I miss crisps." #heartwarming
Thank you @Oh4amuseoffire for getting me Hamilton tickets!
I feel I should inform you it's National Hat Day, which is a real thing. Let's all read Far Away to celebrate. @StephensSimon @EuphoricInk
I want to make a webseries where @BarackObama & @JoeBiden are married and drive around in a van solving mysteries. I think they'd approve.
And thank you very much to @CurveLeicester for hosting us playwrights for the week. #WritetoPlay
The most amazing week writing and studying playwriting with @graeae, Ola Animashawun, Vivienne Franzman, and the wonderful WritetoPlay-ers!
Debate in the writers' room: do actors really like actioning the verb? #acting
Interview with me for Puppy @VAULTFestival https://t.co/u5k0ShdVTq
@Claustrophilia_ I just realised Travelodge should be one word.
Day 1 @graeae #WritetoPlay: Communitas, interrogating humanity, ownership of plays, diversity, Cats! lots of laughs, Belgian garlic frites.
Can't believe I get paid to talk about playwriting all day. #win
@TalkTalk Yes, like I said I can watch and record the same channels I can't watch old recordings from. Namely Gold and ScyFi.
@TalkTalk No, that page doesn't mention anything about recordings you've already watched suddenly becoming unavailable.
Ten sleeps till @graeae Write to Play starts! (Only three days, but I like to nap a lot.)
I swear all that got me through house moving without a death was Cabin Pressure, @StephensSimon' podcasts and @honestactors.
@TalkTalk It's just the old Sky recordings: "Recording is currently unavailable. IPC6039."
@TalkTalk Yes, I've watched them before. It's only old Sky recordings, I can watch old freeview recordings. I can watch and record Sky now,
@TalkTalk Moved house, and now all my TV recordings on YouView box are "unavailable"? Can watch live, and record, but not watch recording.
Haven't unpacked any of my clothes but my plays and theatre books are on the shelves. #priorities #movinghouse https://t.co/BbCS7zaRSg
@bushtheatre @HPinterTheatre The Snowman of La Mancha #coldplays
"Accio entire flat contents." #worthashot #movinghouse
@Oh4amuseoffire Going to watch it tonight! I booked for HP more than a year in advance.
@Oh4amuseoffire Still haven't seen it! Finally saw the Harry Potter play(s).
@NoelClarke Very well said. There are so many nice people out there - sometimes our voices get drowned out because the non-nice.
@WiTAward Pomona @OrangeTreeThtr and Tipping the Velvet @LyricHammer
Last night in the home I've lived in for a decade!
@bushtheatre Yes, very interested!
Jesus, we're in the Daily bloody Mail this morning. Happy 2017. #ugh
Quote of the night: "You look like you've been bukkaked by leprechauns."
Happy new year!!! Why is the BBC showing rave hits of the 90s?
Best party ever!!! @NHM_London https://t.co/PSM9dnycpU
@StephensSimon I'm at @NHM_London NYE party and the main activity is hat making. Hmmm! #FarAway https://t.co/aMJ0Cf88J9
Busy day doing interviews to promote 'Puppy' @VAULTFestival.
@LillyDriscoll Might work that into the script...
Admittedly the stakes are very low, but Norman in a Russian hat might be the highlight of 2016. #gbbo
#TeamNorman4Life #gbbo (Yes, I'm only watching it three days late, I know.)
@ecotricity switch my existing Ecotricity account to my new address? Why so complicated?
@ecotricity I'm a current customer, moving house soon. I've been told I have to cancel account and set up as new customer, no way to just
@TalkTalk I didn't do anything, your engineer did. No Internet access at all since yesterday morning!
@TalkTalk You replaced my broken router 2 weeks ago, new router constantly stops working (needs to be reset) every few minutes.
Hard to believe this was *coughcough* years ago! Am I an adult yet? #birthday https://t.co/ugfNgukhhA
@josierourke Gosh that's cheered me up. Merry Christmas. x ðŸŽ„
@braintree_ Is that a random bit of satsuma?
That moment you finally find your entry point into a new play. It's about neuroscience and memory, trigger is: fresh raspberries.
Forget Doctor Who and Bake Off the real Christmas Day treats are all going down on National Geo channel. #festive https://t.co/7VceZiRuzS
When @NHM_London staff dress code email mentions you can make use of in-house "glitter artists." #win #alltheglitter ðŸ‘ðŸ˜ðŸ˜œ
I'm also the only one buying Lemsip, oven pizza, two family sized bags of kettle crisps and a single banana. #kettlechips #MINEALLMINE
I swear I'm the only person doing their last minute shopping in Barnes Sainsburys who isn't "off the telly." #youmustbethisfamoustolivehere
Now googling "pre 20th century alien abduction claims." Happy Christmas Eve Eve!
@vickster51 Literally went straight from end of S9 into S10, now on Were-Monster. Next time I see you we have got to talk about it!
@alaknights I hope beyond hope your own matching hat was simply off-camera.
Gosh, watching the old and the new X Files straight after the other is kind of sad and kind of hilariously bizarre. #needsmorweremonsters
@LillyDriscoll Monsieur Elephant just sent me the most raging novel-length email. #buhbye
@rosie_snooper @NHM_London @NHM_Learn I'm fairly certain we have more than one pangolin lady. V cool.
They killed the Midsomer Murders dog. 2016 really giving till the end.
My Christmas Tree theme is "2016." #nailedit https://t.co/KfX3zPO3hp
